data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The modules perform searches on multiple online translators like
    http://ultralingua.net/ and union found results. Hence, the
    namespace WWW::MetaTrans might also be just fine. Still the
    interface is general enough to use other data sources then online
    translators. It can also use locally installed translators, for
    example. For this reason WWW::MetaTrans is a bit misleading. For I
    don't know about any other suitable namespace to use as a base, I
    suggest a new base namespace.
